home.title: The Goal
home.tagline: Helping small business owners create a strong web presence.

services.description: Every business needs to make a strong first impression and your website is the first thing many people will see. Our focus is to build responsive, clean and user-friendly websites that will keep people coming back.
From custom social media posts to layout design. We create clean, simple and beuatiful designs. Intuitive for the user and easy on the eyes.
Your busy and you most likely don't have time to focus on multiple social accounts. Let us create fresh and engaging social media posts to all of your accounts, so you can do the work you NEED to do!

items.title: B-Side Games
items.askPOne: B-Side was in need of a full site redesign and social media posts consitency. Utilizing the tools provided by Wix, which are very limiting, we were able to create a clean, modern and fun design for the game store. We also created custom database entries in Wix to update new card game releases automatically, using jQuery, along with adding custom widgets for Discord and TCGPlayer. As for social media, we created a clean aesthetic that gets straight to the point and delivers the information needed to the user. We are also creating a Twitter and YouTube account for the store, so that we can post box openings of product and reviews to furhter engage customers.
items.askPTwo: There are plans to move B-Side of off Wix and to a much more robust ecommerce solution so that they can begin shipping to other states and reaching a larger audience.

items.title: WHWF Spokane
items.askPOne: WHWF Spokane came to us with an interesting ask. They needed to have forms from Bloomerang properly formatted and setup through their Wix site, which doesn't offer direct support to Bloomerang. They approached multiple shops regarding this and were given options that did not fit their needs. We were able to customize the forms HTML, CSS, and Javascript directly so that the forms could be from Bloomerang and formatted to their liking. We also corrected errors in regard to the form captchas not working properly by updating the site keys via Google's captcha API.
items.askPTwo: We also transferred their domain from GoDaddy to Wix hosting an updated design and layout on multiple different pages throughout the site.

testimonials.author: Ryan Paburn
testimonials.testimonialPOne: "We want to tell you about the work Michael Halbrook did for us and the great results it brought to our company. First off, Michael was very professional and came to us with great ideas to help our internet business grow and look more professional. The prices were very fair and generous for the work he put forth. His work alone increased our Web Presence by 38% and our sales increased by 27% for web orders. I would highly recommend him to any and all companies that want to increase web orders and web presence."

testimonials.author: Geneva Johns-Kloor
testimonials.testimonialPOne: "Michael really came through for Women Helping Women Fund when we needed a developer for our Wix site. We had spoken to six other vendors (some even certified as Wix friendly) and he was the only one willing to take on our project without changing the scope.
testimonials.testimonialPTwo: It was important to us that we use the code provided by our database provider for the forms on our site. Other vendors would only take on the project if we would settle for a workaround solution, but Michael made it happen. He was able to get the forms up and running while also making them look visually appealing. He listened to our needs and produced great results despite the weird quirks we found with the Wix platform.
testimonials.testimonialPThree: He also helped us to optimize our site and fix some other pieces that were giving our staff some trouble. He was very responsive and a great communicator through the whole process. He went above and beyond on our project."

header.tagline: When we first decided to do this, we established that we were dedicated to helping small business owners realize their dreams and becoming web relevent without having to mortgage their home to do so. We understand that it's a difficult road, so let us help you navigate it!
